thread.title: BRIEF-China Soft Power Technology Buys 5 Mln Shares Of CMBC Capital For HK$2.8 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-China Soft Power Technology Buys 5 Mln Shares Of CMBC Capital For HK$2.8 Mln

organizations.name: china soft power technology holdings ltd

text:
Jan 10 (Reuters) - China Soft Power Technology Holdings Ltd :
* BOUGHT 5 MILLION SHARES OF HK$0.01 EACH IN SHARE CAPITAL OF CMBC CAPITAL FOR HK$2.8 MILLION
* ANNOUNCES ‍ACQUISITION OF SHARES IN CMBC CAPITAL HOLDINGS LTD​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
